title: Sunset concert in Murphysboro pushed back due to extreme heat | Video | wsiltv.com
text: Sunset concert in Murphysboro pushed back due to extreme heat Weather Alert ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with heat index values of 110 to 115 degrees. * WHERE...Portions of southern Illinois, western Kentucky, and southeast Missouri. * WHEN...Until 8 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Do not leave young children and pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors will reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. && Currently in Carterville 92°F Partly Cloudy 92°F / 77°F 6 PM 92°F 7 PM 89°F 8 PM 85°F 9 PM 80°F 10 PM 79°F Online Poll [ How Do You Prefer Your Peeps Candy!](/news/how-do-you-prefer-your-peeps-candy/poll_3dd76c4e-eded-11ee-af5b-3b343624cfa0.html) You voted: © Copyright 2024 Allen Media Broadcasting , 1416 Country Aire Dr. Carterville, IL | [Terms of Use](/site/terms.html)| [Privacy Policy](/site/privacy.html) Powered by
